title: keys
body: i have played more than 100 games won 50 of them with champions that i own and didnt get s .I win the game get s and no key.Buy a new cham win a game get s no key is this a bug or what.(sry for my bad english)

replies.body:
Keep in mind that you do not earn Key fragments for every win.  You simply have a chance to earn a key fragment if you win a match (does not require an S).  Once you earn a key, your chances of earning another one lower dramatically, so it may take some time to earn key fragments!

Chests however are earned through earning a S rank.  However, there are some conditions that apply to this.  You can read all of the requirements to earn a chest in our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233).

Let me know if you have any further questions!
